title: Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) Generator
description: Generates a comprehensive SBOM in CycloneDX or SPDX format, documenting all dependencies, licenses, and security metadata.
template:
Generate a Software Bill of Materials (SBOM) for {{project_name}} in {{sbom_format}} format.

1. List all direct and transitive dependencies with exact versions
2. Include component metadata: name, version, supplier, download location
3. Document license information for each component
4. Add vulnerability references (CVE IDs) for known issues
5. Include hashes (SHA-256) for integrity verification
6. Document dependency relationships and scope (runtime, test, build)
7. Add project metadata: name, version, authors, repository URL
8. Validate against {{sbom_format}} specification
9. Provide summary statistics

Project: {{project_name}}
Version: {{project_version}}
Repository: {{repo_url}}
Format: {{sbom_format}}

Output: Valid {{sbom_format}} JSON/XML + Summary Statistics

examples.output_outline: CycloneDX 1.5 JSON with 127 components (45 direct, 82 transitive), 23 unique licenses, 3 components with known vulnerabilities, complete dependency graph, SHA-256 hashes, summary: 89% OSI-approved licenses, 97.6% up-to-date dependencies

title: Open Source License Compliance Checker
description: Audits project dependencies for license compliance issues, identifying incompatible licenses and potential legal risks.
template:
Perform license compliance audit for {{project_name}} with {{target_license}} licensing.

1. Scan all dependencies and extract license information
2. Identify licenses incompatible with {{target_license}} (e.g., GPL vs MIT)
3. Detect missing or ambiguous license declarations
4. Flag copyleft licenses that require source disclosure
5. Check for license conflicts between dependencies
6. Assess commercial use restrictions
7. Identify deprecated licenses (JSON, WTFPL)
8. Generate compliance report with risk levels
9. Suggest alternative packages where conflicts exist

Target License: {{target_license}}
Commercial Use: {{commercial_use}}
Distribution Method: {{distribution_method}}

Output: License Matrix | Conflict Report | Recommendations | Approval Requirements

commercial_use.description: Whether project is for commercial use

distribution_method.description: How the software will be distributed

examples.output_outline: Report showing 4 GPL dependencies requiring removal/replacement, 2 AGPL packages incompatible with SaaS, 89% permissive licenses (MIT/Apache), recommendations to replace GPL components with permissive alternatives, legal review required for 6 packages
